title: Gpu data model from Gaia-x service characteristics group
description: Graphical processing unit of virtual and physical machines.

gpuMemory.description: Property. Size of memory of the GPU.

gpuInterconnection.description: Property. Interconnection of multiple GPUs within a server systemEnum:'NVLink', 'RoCE2', 'Xe Link', 'Infinity Fabric', 'other', 'none'

gpuProcessingUnits.description: Property. Number of processing units, also called compute units, execution units or streaming multiprocessors, of the GPU.

gpuPassthrough.description: Property. If true, GPU is provided via passthrough, otherwise GPU is virtualized.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be GPU
